docs.title: Welcome to MkDocs
docs.text: For full documentation visit mkdocs.org.

docs.title: Commands
docs.text:
• mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project.
  • mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server.
  • mkdocs build - Build the documentation site.
  • mkdocs -h - Print help message and exit.

docs.title: Project layout
docs.text:
mkdocs.yml    # The configuration file.
docs/
    index.md  # The documentation homepage.
    ...       # Other markdown pages, images and other files.

docs.title: More virtual controllers
docs.text:
Choose between masquerading your controller as a virtual Xbox 360, DualShock 4 or DualSense to support a wide variety of games.

DualSense Emulation is still worked on

DualSense emulation as the youngest kid on the block still needs tweaking so your milage may vary, keep that in mind!

docs.title: Sleek New User Interface
docs.text: A modern and streamlined look for a more intuitive user experience.

docs.title: Robust Support for Multiple Controllers
docs.text:
Connect and play with multiple controllers for an immersive gaming experience.

DualShock 4 support arrived

In addition to the DualSense (PS5 Controller) its predecessor, the DualShock 4, is now also recognized!

docs.title: Highly Customizable Profile System
docs.text: Tailor your gaming experience with ease.

docs.title: Action System and Controller Page Interface
docs.text: Live and ready, offering dynamic user interactions and customization.

docs.title: Haptic Feedback Modes
docs.text: Immerse yourself in your games with our dynamic haptic feedback modes:

docs.title: Audio To Haptics
docs.text: Feel the rhythm of your game through haptic feedback.

docs.title: Rumble To Haptics
docs.text: Experience vibrations like never before.

docs.title: Button To Haptics
docs.text: Get tactile responses from your controller's buttons.

docs.title: Trigger To Haptics
docs.text: Precise feedback through the adaptive triggers.

docs.title: Joystick To Haptics
docs.text:
Navigate the virtual world with nuanced haptic sensations.

docs.text:
• In Steam, navigate to the installation directory like so:
  • Go into the Main_v3_Beta folder:
  • Go into the logs folder:
  • In here sort by Date Modified to have the most recent files on top:

docs.title: Advanced feature mapping
docs.text: Ability to map touchpad, thumbsticks and motion controls to different outputs.

docs.title: Enhanced Community Collaboration
docs.text: Share and download profiles, and enjoy improved tools for mod development.
